ovdesc.p: This file contains information necessary for producing CRB/CRF reports in a currency other than the local currency.

To convert a report enter the key of this record in the BASE.CCY.PARAM field of the appropriate record in the RE.STAT.REQUEST file. This alone is not enough to provide the report. To enable the information to be extractecd for reporting, a record must be entered in RE.BASE.CCY.REQ (q.v.) and the extract must be run by either:
a. Verifying the RE.BASE.CCY.REQ record online
b. Inputting and authorising the BATCH record EOD.RE.BASE.CCY.CRF so that it runs daily and the currency code of the RE.BASE.CCY.PARAM record is in the DATA field.
Verifying the RE.STAT.REQUEST record or indentifying it in the BATCH job EB.STAT.PRINT will produce the report.
To convert a CRB report append an asterisk and the currency code to the report name in the BATCH record EOD.RE.BALANCE.PRINT, e.g. SBSUSA*USD.

desc.p: Category for non-contingent conversion/reval differences

Amounts in base currency are not converted for reporting. This can lead to a difference from the local currency revaluation equivalent. This difference from non-contingent items is reported as belonging to the category entered here.
4 or 5 numeric characters: a) Product/P&L classification in the range 1-99. b) Sub-classification of product/P&L in the range 000-999. (Mandatory input) Must exist on the CATEGORY file
